title: Login page not loading
description: The login page fails to load on Chrome and Firefox.

title: Error 500 on checkout
description: Users receive a 500 server error when completing a purchase.

title: Password reset email not sent
description: Reset password emails are not being delivered to users.

title: Slow page load on reports
description: Reports page takes more than 15 seconds to load.

title: Notifications not appearing
description: Users report missing notifications in the dashboard.

title: Mobile app crashes on login
description: App crashes immediately after entering credentials.

title: Incorrect tax calculation
description: Invoices calculate tax incorrectly for certain regions.

title: Search function returns no results
description: Searching for existing records sometimes yields no results.

title: Profile picture upload failing
description: Uploading profile images fails with 400 error.

title: Two-factor authentication not triggering
description: Users are able to login without completing 2FA step.

title: UI misalignment on dashboard
description: Widgets overlap on smaller screens causing layout issues.

title: Notification badge not updating
description: Badge count does not update after reading notifications.
